description: Discovery and enumeration modules that identify open services (TCP/UDP/ICMP) and enumerate protocols while respecting randomization and jitter policies.
steps: Implement discovery probes for TCP/UDP/ICMP using randomized target ordering and scheduling parameters
Add banner analysis and fingerprinting capabilities for HTTP, SSH, SMB, RDP, LDAP, and custom protocols
Feed discovered services to the enumeration queue with policy-driven concurrency limits
Integrate rate-limit, jitter, and random source-port behavior to prevent fingerprinting
Test discovery coverage with lab targets and mock timing variability
acceptance_criteria: Services across HTTP/SSH/SMB/RDP/LDAP are discovered with captured banners
Discovery obeys randomization/jitter parameters and never emits deterministic probe sequences
Enumerators receive consistent discovery inputs and schedule follow-on tests
